description: Rate a tender against applicable rate agreements.
permissions: Allowed for users who can create a tender offer for the tender. This delegates to the tender create policy: broker tenders require admin or broker membership on the buyer; customer tenders require admin, buyer customer membership, or seller broker membership.
side_effects: Computes rate agreement rates and shift set time card constraints for the tender; if --persist-changes true, writes updates back to the tender (rates/constraints).
validation_notes: --tender is required and must be non-empty. Boolean flags must be set to true or false. The tender must be present. Adjustment cost index value presence is validated unless --skip-adjustment-cost-index-value-presence-validation true; validation errors occur when a rate adjustment requires a cost index value missing for the adjustment date. If --persist-changes true, validation fails when the tender has invoices that prevent changes. Defaults: replace_rates=true, replace_shift_set_time_card_constraints=true, persist_changes=false when not provided.

flags.name: tender
flags.validation: Required; must be a non-empty string.

flags.name: replace-shift-set-time-card-constraints
flags.description: Replace existing shift set time card constraints (true/false).

flags.name: skip-validate-customer-tender-hourly-rates
flags.description: Skip customer tender hourly rate validation (true/false).
